name: Happy House Behavioral Valley
specialty: Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center)

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Happy House Behavioral Valley is a Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in Phoenix, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $62.3M in Medicaid payments across 97K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $62.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
